ygData.subject: Re: Erudite Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I just switched to play a wizard from a necromancy for 3 days.  My question to this group is, how powerful a wizard is in EQ, comparing to other classes?
ygData.messageBody:
I just switched to play a wizard from a necromancy for 3 days. My question
to this group is, how powerful a wizard is in EQ, comparing to other
classes?

Maestra

----- Original Message -----
From: Sheldon, Colin <Colin.Sheldon@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, April 16, 1999 1:09 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Erudite Quests


> From: "Sheldon, Colin" <Colin.Sheldon@...>
>
> Greetings, All.
>
> Has anyone had any luck finding wizard quests in Erudin? If so, from whom
> do you get them?
>
> Thanks for any thoughts.
>
> Aethelstan
